coachView.name: Dashboard Template
coachView.layout:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?><ns2:layout xmlns:ns2="http://www.ibm.com/bpm/CoachDesignerNG" xmlns:ns3="http://www.ibm.com/bpm/coachview"><ns2:layoutItem xsi:type="ns2:CustomHTML" version="8550" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><ns2:id>d5378bf9-8330-4a93-849a-68482b3d6430</ns2:id><ns2:layoutItemId>CustomHTML1</ns2:layoutItemId><ns2:configData><ns2:id>85b84cc0-4a2a-47a3-8309-7f55cbdb8cf2</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.contentType</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>TEXT</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>07cea877-78ff-4d94-8fa7-d09c538a4a9d</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.textContent</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>    <div class="container body">
      <div class="main_container">
 </ns2:value></ns2:configData></ns2:layoutItem><ns2:layoutItem xsi:type="ns2:CustomHTML" version="8550" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><ns2:id>d90032a1-5e8f-478a-8a50-64fc7d1eea5f</ns2:id><ns2:layoutItemId>CustomHTML5</ns2:layoutItemId><ns2:configData><ns2:id>c854a142-bc3e-4b3e-82df-4a3f306ad00a</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.contentType</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>TEXT</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>1c87105d-60c3-487c-8f92-6711549991e9</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.textContent</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>        <div class="col-md-3 left_col">
          <div class="left_col scroll-view">
            <div class="navbar nav_title" style="border: 0;">
              <a href="index.html" class="site_title"><i class="fa fa-certificate"></i> <span>Dosvak Monitoring</span></a>
            </div>

            <div class="clearfix"></div>

</ns2:value></ns2:configData></ns2:layoutItem><ns2:layoutItem xsi:type="ns2:ContentBox" version="8550" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><ns2:id>cf6593c1-f82d-4b3e-8af3-7de31930b435</ns2:id><ns2:layoutItemId>ContentBox2</ns2:layoutItemId></ns2:layoutItem><ns2:layoutItem xsi:type="ns2:CustomHTML" version="8550" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><ns2:id>4b88824c-8296-4ca0-85ef-69c92d998dbd</ns2:id><ns2:layoutItemId>CustomHTML7</ns2:layoutItemId><ns2:configData><ns2:id>210d44dd-da7f-4d24-83fa-4376cea9f69f</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.contentType</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>TEXT</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>62b941d1-e494-4e05-8c8d-2259217b07cf</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.textContent</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>            <!-- sidebar menu -->
            <div id="sidebar-menu" class="main_menu_side hidden-print main_menu">
              <div class="menu_section">
                <ul class="nav side-menu">
                  <li><a><i class="fa fa-home"></i> Home <span class="fa fa-chevron-down"></span></a>
                    <ul class="nav child_menu">
                      <li><a id="0" onclick="return makeTabVisible(this.id);">System Summary</a></li>
                      <li><a id="1" onclick="return makeTabVisible(this.id);">System Info</a></li> 
                      <li><a id="2" onclick="return makeTabVisible(this.id);">Online Users</a></li>
                      <li><a id="3" onclick="return makeTabVisible(this.id);">Inventory</a></li>
 <!--                      <li><a  id="4"  onclick="return makeTabVisible(this.id);">Dashboard Settings</a></li> -->
                      <li><a id="5" onclick="return makeTabVisible(this.id);">Notifications and Alerts</a></li>
                    </ul>
                  </li>
                  <li class="active"><a><i class="fa fa-binoculars"></i> Monitoring and Alerts <span class="fa fa-chevron-down"></span></a>
                    <ul class="nav child_menu" style="display:block;">
                      <li><a id="6" onclick="return makeTabVisible(this.id);" ><i class="fa fa-file"></i>  Web Servers</a></li>
                      <li><a id="7" onclick="return makeTabVisible(this.id);" ><i class="fa fa-file-code-o"></i>  Web Services Endpoints</a></li>
                      <li><a id="8" onclick="return makeTabVisible(this.id);" ><i class="fa fa-database"></i>  Databases</a></li>
                       <li><a id="9"  onclick="return makeTabVisible(this.id);"><i class="fa fa-users"></i>  LDAP Servers</a></li>
                     <li><a id="11"  onclick="return makeTabVisible(this.id);"><i class="fa fa-envelope"></i>  Email Servers</a></li>
				<li><a id="10" onclick="return makeTabVisible(this.id);" ><i class="fa fa-flag"></i>  Event  Managers</a></li> 
                     <li><a id="12" onclick="return makeTabVisible(this.id);" ><i class="fa fa-desktop"></i>  Operating System</a></li>
                       <li><a id="13" onclick="return makeTabVisible(this.id);" ><i class="fa fa-server"></i>  Application Server</a></li>
                      <li><a id="14"  onclick="return makeTabVisible(this.id);"><i class="fa fa-check"></i>  ODM Rule Applications</a></li>
                      <li><a id="15"  onclick="return makeTabVisible(this.id);"><i class="fa fa-file-text"></i>  ECM Servers</a></li> 
                    </ul>
                  </li>
                </ul>
              </div>

            </div>
            <!-- /sidebar menu -->

            <!-- /menu footer buttons -->
<!--            <div class="sidebar-footer hidden-small">
              <a data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Settings">
                <span class="glyphicon glyphicon-cog" aria-hidden="true"></span>
              </a>
              <a data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="FullScreen">
                <span class="glyphicon glyphicon-fullscreen" aria-hidden="true"></span>
              </a>
              <a data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Lock">
                <span class="glyphicon glyphicon-eye-close" aria-hidden="true"></span>
              </a>
              <a data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Logout" href="login.html">
                <span class="glyphicon glyphicon-off" aria-hidden="true"></span>
              </a>
            </div> -->
            <!-- menu footer buttons -->
          </div>
        </div>
</ns2:value></ns2:configData></ns2:layoutItem><ns2:layoutItem xsi:type="ns2:CustomHTML" version="8550" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><ns2:id>bcc7aab3-90e8-4160-8e5c-dda49b86b45f</ns2:id><ns2:layoutItemId>CustomHTML2</ns2:layoutItemId><ns2:configData><ns2:id>06c2b4e2-74e4-4cb7-8308-c7a5454cbe4f</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.contentType</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>TEXT</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>f2d259d1-f25d-49b7-83be-4fe00ddc55ed</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.textContent</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>        <!-- top navigation -->
        <div class="top_nav">
          <div class="nav_menu">
            <nav>
              <div class="nav toggle">
                <a id="menu_toggle"><i class="fa fa-bars"></i></a>
              </div>

              <ul class="nav navbar-nav navbar-right">
                
</ns2:value></ns2:configData></ns2:layoutItem><ns2:layoutItem xsi:type="ns2:ContentBox" version="8550" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><ns2:id>585710ae-4016-41ce-8ec2-c9044c122200</ns2:id><ns2:layoutItemId>ContentBox3</ns2:layoutItemId></ns2:layoutItem><ns2:layoutItem xsi:type="ns2:CustomHTML" version="8550" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><ns2:id>d6a3dbc1-e21d-4c06-81f4-cfb52ae15acc</ns2:id><ns2:layoutItemId>CustomHTML8</ns2:layoutItemId><ns2:configData><ns2:id>83956554-ae72-42ce-8294-f02fe5d47932</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.contentType</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>TEXT</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>c20c67c7-4599-49b4-8bd4-603152efe1b7</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.textContent</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>              </ul>
            </nav>
          </div>
        </div>
        <!-- /top navigation --></ns2:value></ns2:configData></ns2:layoutItem><ns2:layoutItem xsi:type="ns2:CustomHTML" version="8550" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><ns2:id>fc658d56-389a-4ac3-80e3-35eae0c7ffb3</ns2:id><ns2:layoutItemId>CustomHTML3</ns2:layoutItemId><ns2:configData><ns2:id>94c6be6d-8665-465a-86b4-76f02abf930b</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.contentType</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>TEXT</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>50e92acd-6499-47cb-858f-761e35b15887</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.textContent</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>        <!-- page content -->
        <div id="content" class="right_col" role="main">
                  <!-- top tiles -->
          <div class="row tile_count">
            <div class="col-md-2 col-sm-4 col-xs-6 tile_stats_count">
              <span class="count_top"><i class="fa fa-user-times"></i> Total Users</span>
              <div class="count">2500</div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-2 col-sm-4 col-xs-6 tile_stats_count">
              <span class="count_top"><i class="fa fa-user-secret"></i> Active Developers</span>
              <div class="count">123.50</div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-2 col-sm-4 col-xs-6 tile_stats_count">
              <span class="count_top"><i class="fa fa-user-plus"></i> Active Portal Users</span>
              <div class="count">2,500</div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-2 col-sm-4 col-xs-6 tile_stats_count">
              <span class="count_top"><i class="fa fa-server"></i> Active Instances</span>
              <div class="count">4,567</div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-2 col-sm-4 col-xs-6 tile_stats_count">
              <span class="count_top"><i class="fa fa-stack-overflow"></i> Active Tasks</span>
              <div class="count">2,315</div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-2 col-sm-4 col-xs-6 tile_stats_count">
              <span class="count_top"><i class="fa fa-stack-exchange"></i> Active Activities</span>
              <div class="count">7,325</div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <!-- /top tiles -->
          <div class="">
            <div class="page-title">
              <div class="title_left">
                <h3 id="SS1">System Summary</h3>
</ns2:value></ns2:configData></ns2:layoutItem><ns2:layoutItem xsi:type="ns2:ContentBox" version="8550" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><ns2:id>99cf2e58-28fb-4c08-8f91-c5ec3e85d2ee</ns2:id><ns2:layoutItemId>ContentBox4</ns2:layoutItemId></ns2:layoutItem><ns2:layoutItem xsi:type="ns2:CustomHTML" version="8550" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><ns2:id>f21eab93-be85-4abd-8b82-2bb3ec0970a7</ns2:id><ns2:layoutItemId>CustomHTML4</ns2:layoutItemId><ns2:configData><ns2:id>0ab14e80-040a-44f3-80c9-85139452a1cb</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.contentType</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>TEXT</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>c473704f-70ac-4bd1-8123-ee3d8d2c8ba3</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.textContent</ns2:optionName><ns2:value></div>
              <div class="title_right">
                <div class="col-md-5 col-sm-5 col-xs-12 form-group pull-right top_search">
</ns2:value></ns2:configData></ns2:layoutItem><ns2:layoutItem xsi:type="ns2:ContentBox" version="8550" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><ns2:id>c0259ea0-74f5-4d27-8636-072d832e918f</ns2:id><ns2:layoutItemId>ContentBox5</ns2:layoutItemId></ns2:layoutItem><ns2:layoutItem xsi:type="ns2:CustomHTML" version="8550" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><ns2:id>f5a6468b-5409-4789-8912-a17eb0a1cbfd</ns2:id><ns2:layoutItemId>CustomHTML9</ns2:layoutItemId><ns2:configData><ns2:id>072de225-eec8-404b-8456-e71b97ffca17</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.contentType</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>TEXT</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>84d612a1-1362-4acb-8dd1-bad1892a6a9e</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.textContent</ns2:optionName><ns2:value><!--                  <div class="input-group">
                    <input type="text" class="form-control" placeholder="Search for...">
                    <span class="input-group-btn">
                      <button class="searchbtn btn btn-default" type="button">Go!</button>
                    </span>
                  </div>-->
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
            
            <div class="clearfix"></div>

<div class="row">
              <div class="col-md-12">
                <div class="x_panel"></ns2:value></ns2:configData></ns2:layoutItem><ns2:layoutItem xsi:type="ns2:ContentBox" version="8550" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><ns2:id>a0e44c13-0863-4834-8b4b-a4714b9da830</ns2:id><ns2:layoutItemId>ContentBox1</ns2:layoutItemId></ns2:layoutItem><ns2:layoutItem xsi:type="ns2:CustomHTML" version="8550" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><ns2:id>5a0b3982-bafa-4e80-8e88-e45f77989ec4</ns2:id><ns2:layoutItemId>CustomHTML6</ns2:layoutItemId><ns2:configData><ns2:id>0eb9c136-78bb-427e-86fa-17eb277eb19d</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.contentType</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>TEXT</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>0f57e020-7fc6-4fb4-892a-14cbd674c791</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.textContent</ns2:optionName><ns2:value></div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <!-- /page content -->

        <!-- footer content -->
        <footer>
          <div class="pull-right">
            Dosvak Monitoring v1.0 - IBM BPM Self Monitoring and Alerts <a href="http://www.dosvak.com">Dosvak Llc</a>
          </div>
          <div class="clearfix"></div>
        </footer>
        <!-- /footer content -->
      </div>
